title: Reading: Lila - An Inquiry into Morals - by Robert M. Pirsig - Chapter 17
description: An important chapter! Different ways to see New York City:  via impact of the Victorian values, the stark contrasts in the most Dynamic place on Earth...and as the Giant - one of Pirsig's best conceptualizations imho
